title: Major FPS Drop
body:
As title says Ill list the following of what I have done.

-Repaired game
-Fresh Install of game
-Defragged system
-Cleaned Registry
-Shut down all background programs
-Updated Video Drivers to latest
-Updated windows to latest.

in patch 7.2 I was able to get 160+ FPS a second on Med settings

Now in patch 7.3 I am going from 20FPS to 90FPS more so on the low low side

My pc is only used for League of legends and no one else touches my PC for anything.

I belive there is somtihng in your patch that is causing this FPS drop as i have made no changes to my pc or software intell the patch came out.


Does anyone have a work around of fix for this?

replies.body: HexTech Restored my FPS thank you for your suggestion.
thank you ill update after i test.

You could have some bad game files after the update or bad drivers that's having problems properly rendering the game.  If that's the case then reducing your settings won't really do too much.  Instead, go over each step of our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune things up and rule out possibilities.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help automate some of those instructions.  Test it out in a custom game and let me know the results!
Update changing to low settings makes 0 difference.
